name: Carnage Kart X
storyline: Carnage Kart X is a retro-inspired Hack N' Slash Kart game combining hand-drawn 2D pixel art and low-poly 3D gameplay like it's 1996! Use your weapons and driving skill to survive swarms of fiendish ghouls and horrendous horrors who would like nothing more than to see you join the ranks of the dead!
summary: Carnage Kart X is a retro-inspired hack n' slash experience combining the feel of classic karting games from the early 90s with Vampire Survivors-like gameplay, combining hand-drawn 2D pixel art and low-poly 3D models for a new perspective on the Survivors-like genre. It's style is reminiscent of something you'd play at the arcade down to the rockin' over-the-top music and over-sized blood spurts/body parts flying off of enemies.
